# id: ServletAsyncArquillianTest -> @Test     @RunAsClient     public void testHello(@ArquillianResource URL url) throws Exception
commentText: @param url the URL is the URL to the web application that was deployed_@throws Exception
codeText: @Test_    @RunAsClient_    public void testHello(@ArquillianResource URL url) throws Exception {_        final String name = "Arnaud"__        given()._            baseUri(url.toString())._            queryParam("name", name)._        when()._            get("/services/hello")._        then()._            body(equalTo(MessageFormat.format("Hello {0} how are you?", name)))__    }
